title: Ed Sheeran’s Naughty Habit, And What’s In Store For His “Mathematics” Tour
description:
Ed Sheeran sits down with Stephen Colbert to talk about his naughty gift-giving habit, the time he met Queen Elizabeth II, and what’s in store for fans who attend his U.S. tour.
